description: A judge authored a judicial opinion

authorship_type.description: Type of authorship: primary, co-author, joined

joined_date.description: Date when judge joined the opinion (if joining later)

indexes: CREATE INDEX authored_type IF NOT EXISTS FOR ()-[r:AUTHORED]-() ON (r.authorship_type)
usage_examples:
// Find judges who authored dissenting opinions
MATCH (j:Judge)-[:AUTHORED]->(o:Opinion)
WHERE o.opinion_type = 'Dissenting'
RETURN j.name, COUNT(o) AS dissent_count
ORDER BY dissent_count DESC

// Judicial philosophy analysis: judge's opinion patterns
MATCH (j:Judge {judge_id: 'judge_bd_001'})-[:AUTHORED]->(o:Opinion)<-[:HAS_OPINION]-(c:Case)
WHERE c.primary_domain = 'Constitutional'
RETURN o.opinion_type, COUNT(*) AS count
